name: Corporate Tri-Clicker
description:
A clicker where the process is divided into three distinct click buttons. You click to receive materials, to tranform those materials into products and to sell these products for money. I tried to make a more active clicker rather than totally idling or mindlessly clicking  between upgrades.

This game was originally made for the Clicker Jam spring 2022

Still contains technical problems, mostly in the stock market part, please view this as a proof of concept rather than a full game.
